sentence.text: In the case-control analysis, the rs9607195 A>G on intergenic area 250 kb away from the ISX gene and the rs12738007 A>G on the intron of the fatty acid metabolic process gene were the most strongly associated SNPs with the risk of schizophrenia (P = 6.2 × 10(-8) , OR = 0.50 and P = 3.7 × 10(-7) , OR = 2.39, respectively).
In subsequent fine-mapping analysis, 6 SNPs of fatty acid metabolic process were genotyped with 310 schizophrenia patients and 604 control subjects.
